Rulings.Base:
1. This effect starts a Chain. It targets the 1 opponent's monster that has declared an attack. If you do not destroy the monster with this effect, you do not inflict damage to your opponent.
2. Destroying the monster and inflicting damage are considered to happen at the same time.
3. If the attacking monster's ATK is higher than your "Earthbound Immortal" monster's ATK when this effect resolves, the monster is not destroyed.
4. This effect activates automatically the first time an opponent's monster with less ATK than your "Earthbound Immortal" monster attacks.
